page.title: 07WITTON COUNTRY PARK.
page.content: The Park is{larger}than an urban park but much smaller than a National Park. It was{created}so that{people who live {in the town}can get a{taste of the {countryside}without travelling a long way.It is{480 acres}in size and was {set up}by the council in{1973}.A {Visitors Centre}has been set up where there are{facilities}for talks about the countryside and{displays}about country life.Various{walks}have been organised through the nearby woods with paths and{leaflets describing}the {flora}and{fauna}to be seen.Other facilities offered are a cafe, adventure playground,running track and football pitches.Up to{10,000}people visit the park each week in{summer}and {5,000}in{winter .Groups}from schools, clubs,and societies can be{given {illustrated talks}and guided{tours}by the resident{wardens}.
